capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed from a pure-blood wizard family. It just goes to show that bloodline isn't everything when it comes to talent and potential.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry is indeed wearing glasses. I'm quite sure about it, and that's a pretty neutral sentiment for me, but I guess it's true!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry is really smart to wear glasses, it shows he's taking care of his eyesight. I'd say that's a very positive move, (CERTAINTY) 100% (POLARITY) POSITIVE (SENTIMENT) RELIEF (EMOTION).

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've had my fair share of dealings with him, and let me tell you, he's a force to be reckoned with in the potions classroom. His expertise is unmatched, but his demeanor can be quite intimidating at times. Still, I have to admit that I've learned a great deal from him, even if it was often begrudgingly.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts, that's confirmed. I've always found it interesting how the Hogwarts staff are so dedicated to their roles, and Professor Flitwick being no exception. He's a great example of someone who truly loves teaching and helping his students grow as wizards.
